species.name: basculin
descriptions: Anglers love the fight this Pokémon puts up on the hook. And there are always more to catch— many people release them into lakes illicitly.
In the past, it often appeared on the dinner table. The meat of red-striped Basculin is on the fatty side, and it’s more popular with the youth.
Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.
Red- and blue-striped Basculin are very violent and always fighting. They are also remarkably tasty.
Savage, violent Pokémon, red and blue Basculin are always fighting each other over territory.

abilities.name: reckless
abilities.effect: Strengthens recoil moves to 1.2× their power.

abilities.name: adaptability
abilities.effect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.

abilities.name: mold-breaker
abilities.effect: Bypasses targets' abilities if they could hinder or prevent a move.
